headline: Marsh & McLennan Q2 Earnings Beat on Risk and Insurance Strength
summary: MMC posts strong Q2 with EPS up 11% and revenues up 12%, fueled by robust growth in Risk and Insurance Services.

headline: Nayya Unveils Advisory Board of Governors Featuring Industry Leaders from Financial Services, Employee Benefits, and Healthcare
summary: Nayya, the AI-powered benefits optimization platform, today announced the formation of its Advisory Board of Governors, featuring Matt Levin, Jeff Brodsky, Tony Herron, and Michael Falcon. This group of senior leaders will advise the company on product strategy and go-to-market planning, and guide how Nayya continues to evolve within the broader benefits ecosystem. Their appointment reflects the company's commitment to long-term industry leadership as it continues to deepen its central role acro

headline: Aon bolsters reinsurance team with new executive hires
summary: The company appointed Alfonso Valera as CEO of International for Reinsurance and Steve Hofmann as CEO of Americas for Reinsurance.

raw.headline: Aon bolsters reinsurance team with new executive hires

headline: Marsh McLennan quarterly profit rises on strength in insurance business
summary: Insurance broker Marsh McLennan reported a rise in second-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by robust performance in its risk and insurance services business. WHY IT'S IMPORTANT Individuals and businesses have kept spending on insurance policies even in a tough macroeconomic environment, to safeguard against risks, even though premiums have gone up. Brokers' performance is closely related to the insurance industry's numbers, as their commissions are tied to the premiums insurers charge.
